xwikidoc.content: This is the space for the Annotations scripts, powering the annotation feature, with the following documents: {{velocity wiki="true"}} #foreach($annDoc in $xwiki.getSpaceDocsName($doc.space)) #if ($annDoc != "WebHome") * [[$annDoc]] #end #end {{/velocity}}
